headline.main: Pujara Confident of Better Show From India's Batsmen
headline.print_headline: Pujara Confident of Better Show From India's Batsmen

lead_paragraph: India are confident they can end a string of batting collapses in their second innings and set Australia a competitive target to chase in the second test, batsman Cheteshwar Pujara said on Sunday.
snippet: India are confident they can end a string of batting collapses in their second innings and set Australia a competitive target to chase in the second test, batsman Cheteshwar Pujara said on Sunday....
